i recently broke up with my girlfriend.

content.text: I'm doing okay, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm hanging in there. I'm trying to keep busy since I recently broke up with my girlfriend.
Oh man, I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel, I recently went through a tough breakup as well.
Yeah, it's definitely not easy. But I'm trying to stay positive and remember all the good times we had together.
That's a good way to look at it. I'm trying to do the same thing.
It's also helpful to remember that you're not alone. There are a lot of people who have been through breakups before, and we can all get through this together.
Thanks, I appreciate that. It's nice to know that I'm not the only one going through this.
Yeah, we're all in this together.
I'm glad we're talking about this. It's helping me feel a little better.
Me too. I'm glad we could help each other out.
No problem. Have a good day!
